channel.title: 🏢 Hokkaido University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Hokkaido University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: No-Regret M${}^{ atural}$-Concave Function Maximization: Stochastic Bandit Algorithms and NP-Hardness of Adversarial Full-Information Setting
item.description: This paper reveals efficient stochastic bandit algorithms for maximizing M-concave functions and proves NP-hardness for adversarial full-information settings.
